text: The 2024 Republican National Convention was an event in which delegates of the Republican Party picked the party's nominees for president and vice president in the 2024 United States presidential election. It was held at the Fiserv Forum in Milwaukee, Wisconsin from July 15 to July 18. Other cities considered to host the convention included: Pittsburgh, Salt Lake City, Kasas City and Nashville. Milwaukee is the first city to host major party conventions in consecutive elections since New York City hosted both the 1976 and 1980 Democratic National Conventions. ==References== Category:2024 United States presidential election Category:United States presidential nominating conventions Category:Republican Party (United States)
title: 2024 Republican National Convention
